title: [K-12] Short-Intensive Course on Engineering Communication Integrating Sustainability

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary engineering knowledge and college-level mathematical competency
context.additional_context: A non-real-time blended learning course optimized for smartphone-based environments. Strengthening self-directed learning competencies through flipped learning and developing sustainable communication skills applicable to real-life contexts.

learning_goals: Learners understand and apply the environmental, social, and cultural dimensions of sustainability to engineering problems.
Learners can express solutions to real-life problems as mathematical models based on sustainability literacy.
Learners complete sustainability project reports through asynchronous discussions and LMS-based collaboration in a flipped learning environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
